pages.text: 75|20|Iya, anata gata wa (hate nai) ukiyo o aishite,
75|21|raise o tokan ni suru.
75|22|Sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kagayaki,
75|23|kare-ra no omo o, aogi miru.
75|24|Mata sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kuraku,
75|25|sebone o kudaku hodo no dai sainan ga, kare-ra ni furikakaru koto o shirudearou.
75|26|Iya,(tamashi ga) nodomoto ni todoku toki,
75|27|iwa reyou. `Dareka, noroi ga dekiru ka.'
75|28|Kare wa ribetsu (no toki)dearu koto o satorudearou.
75|29|Hitotsu no ashi wa taho no ashi ni karamari,
75|30|sonohi kare wa, omo ni karitate rareru.
75|31|Kare wa shinri o ukeirezu, mata reihai mo bo-ge nakatta,
75|32|kaette (Mari) o kyogi to shi, somuki sari,
75|33|omoi agatte kazoku no moto ni omomuita.
75|34|Anata (tashinkyo to) ni wazawai are,(hontoni) wazawai naru ka na.
75|35|Kasanete iu. Anata ni wazawai are,(hontoni) wazawai naru ka na.
75|36|Ningen wa,(mokuteki mo naku) sono mama de honin sa reru to omou no ka.
75|37|Motomoto kare wa shashutsu sa reta, itteki no seiekide wa nakatta ka.
75|38|Sore kara hitokatamari no chi to nari, sarani arra ga,(kinsei ni) katachidzukuri,
75|39|kare wa, ningen o otome no ryosei ni nasa reta node wa nakatta ka.
75|40|Sore demo kare ni wa, shisha o yomigaera seru o-ryoku ga nai to suru no ka.
76|1|Ningen ni wa, nani mo no tomo yobenai, nagai jiki ga attade wanai ka.
76|2|Hontoni ware wa kare o kokoromiru tame kongo shita itteki no seieki kara ningen o tsukutta. Sorede ware wa chokaku to shikaku o kare ni sazuketa.
76|3|Ware wa, ningen ni (tadashi) michi o shimeshita. Kansha suru mono (shinjiru mono) ni naru ka, shinjinai mono ni naru ka, to.
76|4|Fushinjin-sha ni wa, ware wa kusari to kubikase to rekka o junbi shite oita.
76|5|(Shinja no) zenkosha wa, kafuru o mazeta hai (no nomimono) o nomudearou.
